name: The Bliss Witch
description:
-ABOUT-

Created in 5 days for Snappy Gurus Game Off! The theme for this jam was "Ignorance Is Bliss"

You play as a witch that runs a shop selling special memory wiping potions to people who wish to forget specific memories.

-CREATED BY-

Programmer: Jacob Moore

Artist: Abby Cali

Composer: Jay Nass

-CONTROLS-
Use WASD to move around, walking into objects will automatically interact with them.

Press "F" at any point to clear your cauldron
